name: Nathan
text: [You notice that it has a lot of heads. Too many heads.]
[You can feel your hands shake violently as it stares you down.]

name: Nathan
text: Nope! Nope! I’m getting out of here!

name: Nathan
text: If I’m gonna be a coward, I’m gonna be a smart one!
[You try to make a break for the door, but a long black stream of goo stops you.].
[Out of instinct, you slowly brush away the residue it left on your face.]
[You hold up your flashlight to the creature.]

name: Nathan
text: If you won’t let me go, then I’ll fight to get out! I’ll make you let me go!

name: Black Blob Monster
text: You face the coursing red river…to battle violence itself…
